51815.「オッケー。女神の蒼銀石は\n 無事 光の河に捧げられたようだな。:
Ok. It seems that Silver Goddess Gem was
safely offered to the River of Light.

51816.「それじゃ 次は 女神に祈るとしよう。\n チカラを抜き リラックスしてくれ。:
Then next time, I'll pray to the Goddess.
Relax and unwind.

51820.<center>魔瘴がもたらす 悪しきチカラは\nアストルティアに住む 生あるも:
The evil power of demon miasma transformed the
living things in Astoltia into monsters.

51821.<center>楽園の時代は 終わりを告げ\n多くの子らが その手に武器を取り\:
The era of Utopia is over, and many children
take up arms in their hands and throw
themselves into the battle against monsters.

51822.<center>六聖陣は この 新たなチカラに望みを託し\n立ち上がりし者たちの:
The Six Saints have placed their hope in this new power, and have decided to take on the role of releasing the hidden potential of
those who have risen to the occasion.

51823.<center>ここに 魔瘴に侵されし者と\nチカラを解放され 使命に目覚めし者:
Here, a new era of holy war between the demon
miasma-infected and the Waking Dead has begun.
